text: April 3, 2018 / 5:45 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago West Indies in Pakistan 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 3 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 3rd twenty20 between Pakistan and West Indies on Tuesday at Karachi, Pakistan Pakistan win by 8 wickets West Indies 1st innings Chadwick Walton c Babar Azam b Mohammad Nawaz 0 Andre Fletcher Run Out Mohammad Nawaz 52 Marlon Samuels b Shadab Khan 31 Andre McCarthy c Fakhar Zaman b Shadab Khan 5 Rovman Powell lbw Faheem Ashraf 2 Jason Mohammed c Sarfraz Ahmed b Usman Khan 13 Denesh Ramdin Not Out 42 Keemo Paul Not Out 1 Extras 0b 6lb 1nb 0pen 0w 7 Total (20.0 overs) 153-6 Fall of Wickets : 1-2 Walton, 2-74 Samuels, 3-90 McCarthy, 4-95 Fletcher, 5-96 Powell, 6-140 Mohammed Did Not Bat : Emrit, Smith, Badree Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mohammad Nawaz 4 1 26 1 6.50 Usman Khan 4 0 34 1 8.50 Shaheen Afridi 4 0 27 0 6.75 Faheem Ashraf 4 0 33 1 8.25 1nb Shadab Khan 4 0 27 2 6.75 Pakistan 1st innings Fakhar Zaman c Denesh Ramdin b Rayad Emrit 40 Babar Azam c Chadwick Walton b Odean Smith 51 Hussain Talat Not Out 31 Asif Ali Not Out 25 Extras 0b 5lb 0nb 0pen 2w 7 Total (16.5 overs) 154-2 Fall of Wickets : 1-61 Zaman, 2-113 Azam Did Not Bat : Malik, Ahmed, Ashraf, Nawaz, Khan, Afridi, Shinwari Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Keemo Paul 2.5 0 37 0 13.06 Rayad Emrit 4 0 24 1 6.00 Odean Smith 3 0 38 1 12.67 2w Samuel Badree 4 0 30 0 7.50 Jason Mohammed 1 0 8 0 8.00 Andre McCarthy 2 0 12 0 6.00 Umpire Ahsan Raza Umpire Aleem Dar Video Shozab Raza Match Referee David Boon
